page.title: 19HOME LIFE_LIFE STYLES
page.content: HOME LIFE - LIFE STYLES Because our block has no shops or other amenities most people who live in this area travel by car. There is a bus service but in common with other rural routes it is infrequent and often only used as a last resource or by those who have no other means of transport. For the majority of shopping for food and clothes most people travel to Newent or Gloucester.There are a selection of shops including several supermarkets. Living in the country entails doing the shopping probably once a week buying fresh and frozen food. There are also several farm shops in the area which sell a wide range of farm produce at a reasonable price. It is getting more common nowadays to have a freezer in the home in which food can be stored for up to 3 months.
